About Justin

I'm a product leader, developer, writer, and former founder living in Dallas, TX with my wife and two kids.

I am Vice President of Product at Pinata, overseeing a team of product managers building the future of media storage and distribution. My focus is on product strategy, go to market for new products and features, and mentorship.

On the side, you can find me building apps, playing with my 3D printer, and writing. My first book, published by Rhythm & Bones Press, came out in 2020 and is available here.

You can contact me by sending me a dm on Twitter or emailing me at justin [at] polluterofminds [dot] com.
